introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: MEVStake ("we", "us", "our", or "the Platform") is committed to protecting your privacy and personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our decentralized finance platform. As a blockchain-based service, we operate with transparency and minimal data collection principles while maintaining the highest security standards. By using our Platform, you consent to the data practices described in this Privacy Policy.

collection.title: 2. Information We Collect
collection.content: MEVStake is designed with privacy-first principles. As a decentralized platform, we collect minimal personal information necessary for platform operation, security, and compliance. We do not collect or store private keys, seed phrases, or other sensitive authentication data.
walletItems: Public wallet addresses for transaction processing and reward distribution
Transaction hashes and blockchain transaction data
Staking positions, amounts, and reward calculations
Referral relationships and referral reward data
MEV bot interaction data and performance metrics
Smart contract interaction logs and gas usage data
technicalItems: IP addresses for security monitoring and fraud prevention
Browser type, version, and device information for compatibility optimization
Operating system and hardware specifications for performance tuning
Usage analytics including page views, session duration, and feature interactions
Error logs and crash reports for platform improvement
Network connection data for performance optimization
Geographic location data (country/region level) for compliance and analytics
communicationItems: Email addresses (if provided for notifications or support)
Social media handles (if used for community engagement)
Feedback and survey responses (if voluntarily provided)

usage.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use collected information exclusively for legitimate business purposes and platform operation:
items: Processing staking transactions, reward distributions, and MEV bot operations
Maintaining platform security, preventing fraud, and detecting suspicious activities
Improving user experience, platform functionality, and performance optimization
Complying with applicable legal requirements, regulations, and tax obligations
Communicating important platform updates, security alerts, and service changes
Conducting analytics and research to enhance MEV bot performance and strategies
Providing customer support and resolving technical issues
Enforcing our Terms of Service and preventing abuse or misuse
Managing referral programs and reward distributions
Conducting audits, compliance checks, and regulatory reporting
Developing new features and services based on user needs and feedback
Maintaining platform stability and preventing system abuse or attacks

sharing.title: 4. Information Sharing and Disclosure
sharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share information only in the following limited circumstances:
items: When required by law, legal process, court order, or government request
To protect our rights, property, safety, or the safety of our users
With trusted service providers who assist in platform operations under strict confidentiality agreements
In connection with a merger, acquisition, sale of assets, or other business transaction
To prevent fraud, abuse, or illegal activities on the platform
With blockchain networks and nodes necessary for transaction processing
To comply with anti-money laundering (AML) and know-your-customer (KYC) requirements
With regulatory authorities when legally required or for compliance purposes
To enforce our Terms of Service or protect against legal claims
With your explicit consent for specific purposes not covered in this policy
sharing.thirdPartyServices: Third-Party Service Providers: We may use third-party services for analytics, security monitoring, customer support, and platform infrastructure. All service providers are bound by strict confidentiality agreements and data protection requirements.

blockchain.title: 5. Blockchain Transparency and Public Data
blockchain.noticeText: All staking transactions, wallet addresses, and smart contract interactions are recorded on the Solana blockchain and are publicly visible to anyone. This includes transaction amounts, timestamps, wallet addresses, and gas fees. This transparency is inherent to blockchain technology and cannot be changed. Please consider this when deciding what information to associate with your wallet addresses.

security.title: 6. Data Security and Protection
security.content: We implement comprehensive security measures to protect your information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction:
items: End-to-end encryption of sensitive data in transit and at rest
Regular security audits, penetration testing, and vulnerability assessments
Multi-factor authentication and access controls for all systems
Secure infrastructure with industry-leading hosting and cloud providers
Incident response procedures and breach notification protocols
Regular security training for all team members and contractors
Secure coding practices and regular software updates
Network security monitoring and intrusion detection systems
Data backup and disaster recovery procedures
Compliance with industry security standards and best practices
Regular review and update of security policies and procedures
Anonymous bug bounty program for security vulnerability reporting
security.breachNotification: In the unlikely event of a data breach, we will notify affected users and relevant authorities within 72 hours as required by applicable laws.

cookies.title: 7. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience and analyze platform usage:
items: Essential cookies required for platform functionality and security
Performance cookies to analyze usage patterns and improve performance (anonymized)
Preference cookies to remember your settings and customizations
Analytics cookies to understand user behavior and platform optimization
Security cookies to prevent fraud and maintain session security
Marketing cookies (with consent) for relevant promotional content
cookies.cookieControl: You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings or our cookie consent banner. Note that disabling certain cookies may affect platform functionality.
cookies.thirdPartyAnalytics: We may use third-party analytics services (such as Google Analytics) to understand platform usage. These services have their own privacy policies and data practices.

retention.title: 8. Data Retention and Deletion
retention.content: We retain your information only as long as necessary for legitimate business purposes and legal compliance:
items: Account and transaction data: Retained for the duration of your account plus 7 years for legal and tax compliance
Security and fraud prevention data: Retained for up to 3 years for ongoing security monitoring
Analytics and usage data: Retained in anonymized form for up to 2 years for platform improvement
Communication records: Retained for up to 3 years for customer support and dispute resolution
Legal and compliance data: Retained as required by applicable laws and regulations
Blockchain data: Permanently recorded on the blockchain and cannot be deleted
Marketing and promotional data: Retained until you opt out or for up to 2 years
retention.deletionRights: You may request deletion of your personal data, subject to legal and operational requirements. Some data may need to be retained for compliance or security purposes.

rights.title: 9. Your Privacy Rights
rights.content: Depending on your jurisdiction, you may have the following privacy rights:
items: Right to access: Request copies of your personal information we hold
Right to rectification: Correct inaccurate or incomplete personal information
Right to erasure: Request deletion of your personal information (subject to legal requirements)
Right to restriction: Limit how we process your personal information
Right to data portability: Receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format
Right to object: Object to processing of your personal information for certain purposes
Right to withdraw consent: Withdraw consent for data processing where applicable
Right to lodge complaints: File complaints with relevant data protection authorities
Right to opt-out: Opt out of marketing communications and certain data processing
Right to non-discrimination: Exercise privacy rights without discrimination
rights.exercisingRights: To exercise these rights, contact us at privacy@mevstake.com. We will respond within 30 days and may require identity verification.

children.title: 10. Children's Privacy
children.content: MEVStake is not intended for users under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a child under 18, we will take steps to delete such information promptly. Parents or guardians who believe their child has provided personal information should contact us immediately.

transfers.title: 11. International Data Transfers
transfers.content: As a global decentralized platform, your information may be processed in various jurisdictions worldwide. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for international data transfers, including:
safeguards: Standard contractual clauses approved by relevant data protection authorities
Adequacy decisions for transfers to countries with adequate data protection
Binding corporate rules for intra-group transfers
Certification schemes and codes of conduct where applicable
Technical and organizational measures to protect transferred data

changes.title: 12. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices, technology, legal requirements, or business operations. Material changes will be communicated through:
notificationMethods: Prominent notices on the Platform interface
Updated timestamps on this Privacy Policy page
changes.acceptance: Your continued use of the Platform after changes become effective constitutes acceptance of the updated Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with the changes, you should discontinue use of the Platform.

contact.title: 13. Contact Information
contact.content: For privacy-related questions, concerns, or to exercise your rights, please contact us:
contactMethods: Website: Contact form on our official website
Support: Through our customer support system
contact.responseTime: We will respond to all privacy inquiries within 30 days and to urgent security matters within 72 hours.
contact.dpo: Data Protection Officer: For users in jurisdictions requiring a DPO, please contact dpo@mevstake.com for data protection matters.
